long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Development and debugging tool for RamJet web framework. The extension allows to open a new modal dialog with diagnostic, debugging and development tools rendered by the web framework serving the page in the currently opened tab. This allows developers to solve problems during development process easier and faster. The tool itself is very simple, it tries to find URL addresses in cookies provided by the rendered web page and open development tool on the same server in the popup window.
